Carrot & Stick The Face Wash

Brand: Carrot & Stick

Category: Facial Cleanser

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Cocamide MIPA, Sodium Chloride, Chondrus Crispus (Irish Moss) Extract, Rosa Moschata Seed Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Citric Acid, Sodium Levulinate, Potassium Sorbate, Potassium Benzoate, Sodium Benzoate
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
